div.class: update-center-alert update-center-alert--full b-lg b-primary bb-solid pb-md

p.strong: Get the latest school information & updates related to the Coronavirus (COVID-19)

div.h1: Preparing our students for excellence inside and outside of the classroom.
div.p: The Evergreen School District is in its 117th year of continuous operation and is located in beautiful Northwest Montana, near Glacier National Park, Flathead Lake, and Whitefish Mountain Resort. Located in the heart of the Kalispell area, Evergreen is an unincorporated community with its own Chamber of Commerce, Rotary Club, and Lions Club. There are approximately 2,400 registered voters and 8,000 residents in Evergreen.

p.strong: Face to Face Kindergarten and Early Kindergarten Registration and Screening scheduled April 23, 2020 has been canceled and will be rescheduled at a later date.
We know you and your little person are excited. So are we! If you are not already registered, go to the Evergreen School District 50 registration materials.

p.a: VIDEO: Evergreen School District Is The Place To Be (YouTube)

h3.a: Evergreen SD50 Is The Place To Be (YouTube Video)

div.style: background-image: url('/themes/Rosewood/images/temp-section-bg-pattern.png'); background-size: auto; background-repeat: repeat; background-position: top left;

div.p: Serving students from grades kindergarten through fourth, East Evergreen Elementary provides students with robust techology in learning, along with library, physical education, and music programs.
Located at 20 W. Evergreen Drive in Kalispell, Mont. School hours 8:30 am -3:30 pm daily. We offer many extra-curricular activities including 7/8 football, 7/8 volleyball, 5-8 basketball, and drama.

The Flathead Crossroads Program is a specialized education program within Evergreen School District #50. Crossroads is tuition-based and open to all member districts in the Flathead Valley. The program is capable of serving up to 46 students from kindergarten through 8th grade.

div.style: background-image: url('/themes/Rosewood/images/temp-section-bg.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: top center;

div.p: To enable students to become responsible citizens and lifelong learners by ensuring quality instruction in a nurturing environment.

18 West Evergreen Drive,
Kalispell, Montana 59901
